rules.title: General Eligibility
items: Exclusively for students of Ananda College.
Individual participation only; no team entries.
Plagiarism will result in immediate termination.
AI tools may be used for brainstorming purposes only. Fully AI-generated submissions are not allowed.
A participant may take part in a maximum of two categories.

rules.title: Submission Protocol
items: Upload to Google Drive with 'Anyone with link' permission.
Format: Grade_Name.zip (e.g. 11_NaveenPerera.zip).
Include 5 workspace screenshots as proof of process.
Submit both final output and project files.
Submission Deadline Will Be On February 2nd, 2026

poster.title: Technical Specifications
items: Task: Design a social media poster based on the theme "Digital Life."
Poster must be digitally designed.
Size: A3 (Portrait or Landscape).
Text usage should be minimal and meaningful.

poster.title: Submission Requirements
items: Stock images, icons, and fonts are allowed.
File format: JPG / PNG / PDF (High Resolution).

3d.title: Technical Specifications
items: Task: Create a 3D model of a sci-fi vehicle or futuristic device.
Models must be originally created by the participant.
Any 3D software may be used.
Pre-made models are not allowed.

3d.title: Submission Requirements
items: Rendered images (minimum 2 angles)
File format: JPG / PNG for renders.

video.title: Technical Specifications
items: Task: Create a movie trailer video based on the theme "A Day in the Future."
Duration: 30 seconds â€“ 2 minutes.
Videos may include motion graphics, effects, transitions, and sound design.
Stock footage, music, and sound effects are allowed.

video.title: Submission Requirements
items: Content must be appropriate for a school environment.
File format: MP4 (Recommended resolution: 1080p).

manipulation.title: Technical Specifications
items: Task: Create a photo manipulation based on the theme "Nature Reimagined."
Submissions must be digitally manipulated images.
Heavy editing, compositing, and surreal concepts are encouraged.
Stock images may be used freely.
The final image must align clearly with the chosen theme.

manipulation.title: Submission Requirements
items: File format: JPG / PNG (High Quality).
Any visible watermark or signature is not allowed.
